name: monetized-mcp

scripts.build: npm i && esbuild ./src --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2022 --format=esm --outfile=build/index.js --banner:js='import { createRequire } from "module"; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);'

description: A TypeScript utility library for handling payments.
author: GuilhermeSantosPlank
